channel.title: CustomGFXModels
channel.description:
I Have Found Out How To Make Custom GFX! :) Here Are The Vids To Prove It :) One Has "HI SKILLER" Flying Across The Screen And If You Can't Read That I Made A Green GFX Ball :) I Think They Look Pretty Cool Here's The Vids
HI SKILLER Text [URL=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=nl1etmOUo2M]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=nl1etmOUo2M[/URL]
GreenGFXBall [URL=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=cZBpIywX1uo]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=cZBpIywX1uo[/URL]
If You Don't Beleive I Did It, Ill Make Whatever You Want "Simple" As A GFX

item.title: CustomGFXModels
item.dc:creator: @the_wanderer The Wanderer
item.description:
@the_wanderer wrote:

The reason you get flamed is because you yourself say you only spend 5-10 minutes on your models. We don’t want you to create a crap model and post on here. We want you to spend 2 hours on a model, feel accomplished about it, and then post on here. Then we can give you criticism and you can learn from it. Not you create a model in 5 mins and say well make it better in 4 mins. 3ds Max is better than blender for sheer modeling purposes. But blender does have where you can create bone structure

Read full topic

item.title: CustomGFXModels
item.dc:creator: @h1_sk1ller h1 sk1ller
item.description:
@h1_sk1ller wrote:

[quote=“rip4d, post:88, topic:352133”][quote author=h1 sk1ller link=topic=448487.msg3310236#msg3310236 date=1281924467]

man, stop sayin like @just cuz u dont kno how@ and stuff like that. just because u know how to make custom gfx’s. dont boast about it plz, u should be helpin people out…

What??

Exactly what i thought, I was adding him to tell him how to do it… If thats not helping then shoot me please, stop spamming my threads when I can’t even understand what your saying : [QUOTE]sayin like @just cuz u dont kno how@[/QUOTE] Stop spamming my threads or gtfo please, ive had enough, ive only been using 3ds max for 2 weeks, No need to spam me so much, and I agree not that much has been posted on here lately…

P.S. Dylan is still your idol because as soon as he says one thing you guys just spam me as hard as you can…
[/quote]Well Dylan is my inspiration for modeling to an extent. Tbh, hes the reason why I’m starting with Blender :P[/quote]

So theres no point i should be on this forum then? Why should I waste my time if im going to get flamed, just because he’s an inspiration to you doesn’t mean you have to spam and flame me just because he says something, as i said im new to 3ds and im sure lots of people are too, but the thing is as soon as he says something, every time! You just go and flame me again, i chose to come back to theese forums, if im not getting respected why don’t I just leave again, im sure you would rather let the models section die right? In the first 2 weeks of dylan using blender i bet he didn’t know about lighting etc, and I hear that 3ds max has more features than blender… I bet im still going to get flamed for even posting this…

Read full topic
